markdownRemark.html:
I spend a few hours uploaded my first NPM modules, chinese-year, which returns the Chinese zodiac animals’ list, or, the name of a particular year. It’s a super simple package, but it’s the first NPM module I published. More on that, it has test cases I wrote with jest, and Travis.ci implementation.

Install

npm install --save chinese-year

Usage

const chineseYear = require('chinese-year')
chineseYear.years
//=> ['Rat', 'Ox', ...]

chineseYear.getAnimal(2000)
//=> 'Dragon'

API

.getAnimal(year: number):string .year:array get zodiac animal name of a year number
